page.title: 17ECONOMICS
page.content: The manager of the local branch of Leeds Building Society is Mr. Tomezyk who originally worked in a bank.This particular branch has only been open for 7 weeks and is one of 9 building societies in the Maghull area. At present Mr. Tomezyk has been unable to find a suitable home in Maghull and so he commutes from Birmingham daily! On average every year 2,900,000 people open a building society account throughout Britain. The largest amount of money every deposited at one time in a Leeds A/c was Â£l30,000 and the busiest days are Thursday and Friday
